data.title: Wikipedia Articles For Taxonomic Authors
data.meta_description: An online resource devoted to North American insects, spiders and their kin, offering identification, images, and information.
data.text:
I have a database of taxonomic authors for my own use, and am presenting some of the data here in hopes it will prove useful. The links are in a format suitable for pasting into the text of guide pages. Encoding issues will take a while to iron out: in the meanwhile, check the wikipedia links after you paste them and let me know which ones are broken.
